fields.description:
Description:
In the KS test: Base UI > Window Properties, almost none of the window property buttons do anything. Only "Layout/dimension" button works.


Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI > Window Properties
3) Click any button beside "Layout/dimension"

Result:
Nothing happens

Expected:
Window properties change
fields.summary: Android: Window: v8/Rhino: Changing window properties has no effect
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111108105548, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111061615, Nexus S (2.3.6), Galaxy 10.1 Tab (3.1) v8 compiler & Rhino compiler

comments.body: The fix for this bug should fix TIMOB-6065 and TIMOB-6064 as related.

Tested with 1.8.0.1.v20111207090257
Xoom (3.2.1) - v8
Samsung Tab 10.1 (3.1) - rhino
